column2: Ready to retrieve the next encoded fob from Lightspeed?

Excellent. So we need to stay sharp and give this our keenest attention. 

We're going to create a new level using every enemy and every Power-up Lightspeed can give us.

So, if all goes well, we'll find that second fob deep in Lightspeed! Let's launch Lightspeed now!
Click on the Lightspeed icon on the desktop.

Okay, let's make some Power-ups! Power-ups are capsules that give your ship special powers.

Very handy indeed! Let's go to the coding panel and see what these special powers can do!

Click on the Spawn tab. See that `spawnPowerup()` function? That's what creates Power-ups.

It creates the type of Power-up you return. For example, `return null;` means _no_ Power-up. 

So now, let's replace `return null;` with `return invulnerable;` and try the level.
Change `return null;` to `return invulnerable;` Then try the level.
Let's see if the Power-ups show up. When they first show up, they won't have any powers yet.
How strange. Looks like we have ZERO Power-ups. Something's wrong. Let's go back and check.
Intriguing! You spawned a Power-up, but it's a different kind. Have a look at your settings again.
Excellent. The Power-ups are there, but they don't do anything yet. Finish the level now.
Great. Your Lightspeed coding skills are still quite sharp.
Check back later and we can keep exploring.
